official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to limit the rate of pay at which the Postal Service may compensate experts and consultants.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Limits the rate of pay at which the United States Postal Service may compensate experts and consultants to the rate payable for grade GS-18 of the General Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to limit the rate of pay at which the Postal Service may compensate experts and consultants.
